control.visible: !SubString(Window(videolibrary).Property(TvTunesIsAlive),True) + Player.HasAudio + !Skin.HasSetting(overlay.enable) + ![Window.IsActive(infodialog) | Window.IsActive(videoscan) | Window.IsActive(musicscan) | Window.IsActive(home) | Window.IsActive(fullscreenvideo) | Window.IsActive(614)]
